text: The Annual Eurovision Song Contest was held in Malmö, Sweden. The semifinals were on 14 and 16 May. The final was on 18 May 2013.http://www.eurovision.tv/page/malmo-2013/about/shows/participants The host for the contest was Swedish Comedian Petra Mede. Denmark won the competition. ==Semi-finals== ===Semi-final 1=== Italy, Sweden and the United Kingdom also voted in this semi-final. The songs colored in orange qualified for the final. Draw Country Language Artist Song English translation Place Points 01 English Natália Kelly "Shine" — 14 27 02 Estonian Birgit "Et uus saaks alguse" So there can be a new beginning 10 52 03 English Hannah "Straight Into Love" — 16 8 04 Croatian Klapa s Mora "Mižerja" Misery 13 38 05 English Emmelie de Forest "Only Teardrops" — 1 167 06 English Dina Garipova "What If" — 2 156 07 English Zlata Ognevich "Gravity" — 3 140 08 English Anouk "Birds" — 6 75 09 Montenegrin Who See "Igranka" (Игранка) The party 12 41 10 English Andrius Pojavis "Something" — 9 53 11 English Alyona Lanskaya "Solayoh" — 7 64 12 Romanian Aliona Moon "O mie" A thousand 4 95 13 English Ryan Dolan "Only Love Survives" — 8 54 14 Greek Despina Olympiou "An me thimasai" (Aν με θυμάσαι) If you remember me 15 11 15 English Roberto Bellarosa "Love Kills" — 5 75 16 Serbian Moje 3 "Ljubav je svuda" (Љубав је свуда) Love is everywhere 11 46 ===Semi-final 2=== Germany, France and Spain voted in this semi-final. The songs colored in orange qualified for the final. Draw Country Language Artist Song English translation Place Points 01 English PeR "Here We Go" — 17 13 02 Italian Valentina Monetta "Crisalide (Vola)" Chrysalis (Fly) 11 47 03 Macedonian, Romani Esma and Lozano "Pred da se razdeni" (Пред да се раздени) Before the sunrise 16 28 04 English Farid Mammadov "Hold Me" — 1 139 05 English Krista Siegfrids "Marry Me" — 9 64 06 English Gianluca "Tomorrow" — 4 118 07 Bulgarian Elitsa & Stoyan "Samo shampioni" (Само шампиони) Only champions 12 45 08 Icelandic Eythor Ingi "Ég á líf" I am alive 6 72 09 Greek Koza Mostra feat. Agathon Iakovidis "Alcohol Is Free" — 2 121 10 Hebrew Moran Mazor "Rak bishvilo" (רק בשבילו) Only for him 14 40 11 English Dorians "Lonely Planet" — 7 69 12 Hungarian ByeAlex "Kedvesem" (Zoohacker Remix) My darling 8 66 13 English Margaret Berger "I Feed You My Love" — 3 120 14 Albanian Adrian Lulgjuraj and Bledar Sejko "Identitet" Identity 15 31 15 English Nodiko Tatishvili and Sopho Gelovani "Waterfall" — 10 63 16 English Takasa "You and Me" — 13 41 17 English Cezar "It's My Life" — 5 83 :1.The song is in Greek, however the titular English phrase is repeated throughout the song. :2.Due to EBU regulations banning political and religious content, Heilsarmee (German for Salvation Army) changed their name to Takasa for the contest. ==Final== Draw Country Language Artist Song English translation Place Points 01 French Amandine Bourgeois "L'enfer et moi" Hell and me 23 14 02 English Andrius Pojavis "Something" — 22 17 03 Romanian Aliona Moon "O mie" A thousand 11 71 04 English Krista Siegfrids "Marry Me" — 24 13 05 Spanish El Sueño de Morfeo (ESDM) "Contigo hasta el final" With you until the end 25 8 06 English Roberto Bellarosa "Love Kills" — 12 71 07 Estonian Birgit "Et uus saaks alguse" So there can be a new beginning 20 19 08 English Alyona Lanskaya "Solayoh" — 16 48 09 English Gianluca "Tomorrow" — 8 120 10 English Dina Garipova "What If" — 5 174 11 English Cascada "Glorious" — 21 18 12 English Dorians "Lonely Planet" — 18 41 13 English Anouk "Birds" — 9 114 14 English Cezar "It's My Life" — 13 65 15 English Bonnie Tyler "Believe in Me" — 19 23 16 English Robin Stjernberg "You" — 14 62 17 Hungarian ByeAlex "Kedvesem" (Zoohacker Remix) My darling 10 84 18 English Emmelie de Forest "Only Teardrops" — 1 281 19 Icelandic Eythor Ingi "Ég á líf" I am alive 17 47 20 English Farid Mammadov "Hold Me" — 2 234 21 Greek Koza Mostra feat. Agathon Iakovidis "Alcohol Is Free" — 6 152 22 English Zlata Ognevich "Gravity" — 3 214 23 Italian Marco Mengoni "L'essenziale" The essential 7 126 24 English Margaret Berger "I Feed You My Love" — 4 191 25 English Nodiko Tatishvili and Sopho Gelovani "Waterfall" — 15 50 26 English Ryan Dolan "Only Love Survives" — 26 5 == References == ==Other websites== *Eurovision.tv Category:2013 in Sweden Category:2013 in music 2013 Category:Malmö
title: Eurovision Song Contest 2013
